name: Shrimp & Quinoa Bowl
description: One meal solution, two ways! Butter Chicken Seasoning infuses the quinoa with notes of garlic and tomato, while the shrimp take out the bold flavours of cardamon, cumin, and coriander. This meal is light, but packed with protein, fiber, and healthy fats, perfect for the summertime!

ingredients.name: Butter Chicken Seasoning or General Tao Seasoning

preparation: In Multipurpose Steamer, combine quinoa, water, and 1 tbsp seasoning. Cover and microwave on high about 12 min, or until tender.
Meanwhile, in Sauté Pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add shrimp and remaining seasoning. Cook, stirring occasionally, until pink and cooked through, about 4–5 min for large shrimp.
Once cooked, divide quinoa between four bowls. Arrange shrimp, mango, cucumber, and lettuce on top of quinoa in bowls. Top with yogurt.
tips: If you have time, let cooked quinoa sit uncovered, 2–3 min, before serving. This will help make it fluffier.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.

products.name: Butter Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: There’s something so enjoyable about a big plate of Butter Chicken with warm naan or rice on the side! Our version is quicker than takeout, ready in just 20 minutes in your Round Steamer, and more affordable. Each serving is around $2, and the recipe serves eight—great for a weekend family get-together.

products.name: General Tao Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: A restaurant favourite at home made with less sugar & sodium. Stir fried, not deep fried.

products.name: Sauté Pan
summary: An all-purpose pan to brown, sauté, and simmer—ideal for one pan meals.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
